name: ts-simple-logger
description: Simple console logger for browsers and Node.

scripts.clean: yarn run clean:dist && yarn run clean:test && yarn run clean:pack
scripts.check: yarn run lint && yarn run check:type
scripts.check:type: yarn run check:type:src && yarn run check:type:test
scripts.check:type:test: yarn run build && yarn run check:type:test:tsc
scripts.build: yarn run clean:dist && yarn run build:bundle && yarn run build:types
scripts.pack: yarn run clean:pack && yarn run pack:dist
scripts.test: yarn run clean:test && yarn run test:unit:coverage && yarn run test:integration
scripts.test:integration: yarn run test:integration:node && yarn run test:integration:browser
scripts.test:integration:node: yarn run build && yarn run pack && vitest run --config vitest.node.config.ts
scripts.all: yarn run clean && yarn run check && yarn run build && yarn run test
